text: Hugh II may refer to: * Hugh II of Lusignan (died 967) * Hugh Magnus, co-king of France (1007-1025) * Hugh II, Duke of Burgundy (1084–1143) * Hugh II of Jaffa (c. 1106–1134) * Hugh II of Cyprus (1252–1267), ruler, also of Jerusalem * Hugh II, Count of Angoulême (1221–1250), a.k.a. Hugh XI of Lusignan * Hugh II, Count of Blois (died 1307) * Hugh II of Arborea (died 1336)
title: Hugh II
